episodes.title: The Cult of Cybele & the Galli: Trans Priests of Ancient Rome
episodes.description:
Discover the mysterious Cult of Cybele and the Galli, the trans priesthood that challenged gender norms in ancient Rome. This video explores the origins of Cybele's worship from Phrygia to Rome, the shocking initiation rituals of the Galli, and how these gender-nonconforming priests held spiritual power in a patriarchal empire. Learn how religion, gender, and politics intertwined in one of history’s most controversial cults.

Chapters:
0:00 Introduction
1:35 Who Was Cybele?
3:50 The Arrival of the Cult in Rome
6:15 The Galli: Trans Priests of the Goddess
9:20 Rituals, Castration, and Identity
13:00 Roman Society’s Reaction
15:30 Legacy and Historical Impact

Subscribe for more powerful stories from ancient history.

#Vista #AncientRome #History
